
# rvest - Web Scraping with R

All files/datasets are in the following [location](https://github.com/notesofdabbler/exploreBooks). The list below gives the specific links to what was covered in the talk.

* Simple example to illustrate package ([link](https://github.com/notesofdabbler/exploreBooks/blob/master/simplePageScrape.md))
* Scraping the first page of book search results for Use R! series of books in Springer site and scraping the details about a single book from the list ([link](https://github.com/notesofdabbler/exploreBooks/blob/master/scrapeData_explore.md))
* Scraping the list of books from Springer that are either part of a statistics series or have R in their title ([link](https://github.com/notesofdabbler/exploreBooks/blob/master/scrapeData.R))
     + The datasets generated by this file are available as .Rda files to be used by the code below
* Exploring the above scraped data to find the top downloaded books and explore the recommended book network ([link](https://github.com/notesofdabbler/exploreBooks/blob/master/exploreData.md))
